mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BookInfo(B_no, B_name, B_typeNo, B_author, B_publicer, B_publiceDate, B_price, B_inventory) VALUES(#{no}, #{name}, #{typeNo}, #{author}, #{publicer}, #{publicDate}, #{price}, #{inventory});
mapper.select: SELECT b1.B_no,b1.B_name,b2.BT_name,b1.B_author,b1.B_publicer, b1.B_publiceDate,b1.B_price,b1.B_inventory FROM BookInfo b1,BookType b2 WHERE b1.B_typeNo=b2.BT_no;
SELECT b1.B_no,b1.B_name,b2.BT_name,b1.B_author,b1.B_publicer, b1.B_publiceDate,b1.B_price,b1.B_inventory FROM BookInfo b1,BookType b2 WHERE b1.B_no=#{isbn} AND b1.B_typeNo=b2.BT_no;
SELECT b1.B_no,b1.B_name,b2.BT_name,b1.B_author,b1.B_publicer, b1.B_publiceDate,b1.B_price,b1.B_inventory FROM BookInfo b1,BookType b2 WHERE b1.B_typeNo=#{typeNo} AND b1.B_typeNo=b2.BT_no;

SELECT b1.B_no,b1.B_name,b2.BT_name,b1.B_author,b1.B_publicer, b1.B_publiceDate,b1.B_price,b1.B_inventory FROM BookInfo b1,BookType b2 WHERE b1.B_name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') AND b1.B_typeNo=b2.BT_no;
SELECT b.BB_no,b.BB_bookNo,b.BB_memberNo,m.M_name,b.BB_borrowTime FROM BorrowBook b,Member m WHERE BB_bookNo = #{isbn} AND BB_backTime IS NULL AND b.BB_memberNo=m.M_memberNo;
